member.name: T:Monolithic.Common.DateTimeConverter
member.summary: Custom JSON converter for DateTime that formats to "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm" (without seconds) This ensures frontend compatibility by removing seconds and milliseconds from datetime values

member.name: T:Monolithic.Common.NullableDateTimeConverter
member.summary: Custom JSON converter for nullable DateTime that formats to "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm" (without seconds)
